extends jeus.management.j2ee.J2EEManagedObjectMBean

        @Description(value="Client\uc640\uc758 \uc5f0\uacb0\uc774 \ube44\uc815\uc0c1 \uc885\ub8cc\ub418\uc5c8\uc744 \uacbd\uc6b0 \uc7ac\uc811\uc18d\uc744 \uae30\ub2e4\ub9ac\ub3c4\ub85d \uc124\uc815\ub41c \uc2dc\uac04")

      • setKeepAliveTime

        @Description(value="Client\uc640\uc758 \uc5f0\uacb0\uc774 \ube44\uc815\uc0c1 \uc885\ub8cc\ub418\uc5c8\uc744 \uacbd\uc6b0 \uc7ac\uc811\uc18d\uc744 \uae30\ub2e4\ub9ac\ub3c4\ub85d \uc124\uc815\ub41c \uc2dc\uac04")
void setKeepAliveTime(@Description(value="keep alive time (\ucd08)")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         int keepAliveTime)
        Client와의 연결이 비정상 종료되었을 경우 재접속을 기다리도록 설정된 시간.

        0 이하로 설정할 경우 비정상 종료된 Connection의 리소스는 즉시 반환된다.

        Parameters:
        keepAliveTime - keep alive time (초)
